site_name: Plot H5 Within Land Bound By New Kent Road (A201) To The NorthRodney Place And Rodney Road To The EastWansey Street To The South And Walworth Road (A215) And Elephant Road To The West. London SE17
description: Details of Condition 5 (H5 RMA) for planning permission 17-AP-2269 Approval of reserved matters (access, scale, appearance, layout and landscaping) for plot H5 within Elephant Park (previously referred to as the Heygate Masterplan) submitted pursuant to Outline Planning Permission ref 12/AP/1092.  The proposals comprise the construction of a development plot ranging between 8 and 25 storeys in height (maximum building height 85.415 m AOD), comprising 384 residential units, 873 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail (A1-A5) uses, 735 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail, office and leisure uses (A1-A5/B1/D2), 124 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail and office uses (A1-A5/B1) car parking, cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, new landscaping and other associated works.
